title: Liam Hemsworth Was Photographed Holding Hands With a Blonde Woman in New York City
text:
From ELLE

Miley Cyrus has had two public romances in the two months since she announced her separation from her ex-husband Liam Hemsworth. Now, the Australian actor doesn't mind the world knowing about his own love life: Hemsworth was photographed out in New York City holding hands with a blonde woman. She has not been identified yet, but TMZ got photos of Hemsworth with her in West Village. The two ate at Sant Ambroeus, wore matching jeans and sunglasses, and went on a walk. The outlet obtained photos of both activities.

Hemsworth's apparent date sighting comes shortly after Us Weekly published a report detailing what he thinks of Cyrus publicly dating again so fast. “He wants what’s best for her—even if it’s not him,” a source told the outlet, adding that Hemsworth is not opposed to dating, either. Although he “hasn’t been dating anyone,” the source said, "he’s open to meeting people.” And clearly he has.

Cyrus defended her own decision to date quickly on Twitter last week after a video emerged of her making out with Cody Simpson at an açaí bowl eatery just two weeks after she ended her relationship with Kaitlynn Carter. Cyrus and Carter's romance became public just as she released her statement announcing she and Hemsworth separated. The married couple had reportedly secretly been separated for months.

Cyrus pointed out the unfair double standard between men and women in regards to dating behavior: "I am trying to just THRIVE/survive in a 'man's' world," she wrote. "If we can’t beat 'em, join 'em! If our president can 'grab 'em by the pussy….' can’t I just have a kiss and açaí bowl?!?!"

She also explained that she is just figuring out her love life too, while the world watches. Get used to it, and give her space to: "This 'dating' thing is new to me too," she wrote. "I’ve never been an 'adult'/ grown ass woman experiencing this," she wrote. "I was in a committed relationship for almost all my teens and early 20s, with the exception of a few breaks, which usually in those times I was working my ass off with not much R&R, and 'meeting / trusting' people in my position is really tuff. Don’t fucking pity me, not what I’m asking for. I have a great life; I wouldn’t trade for 'privacy,' but PLEASE don’t make this awkward for me! I am trying to make light and like always MAKE FUN of myself / and the public’s perception of me! Get used to me dating—this is where I am at! #HotGirlFall"

description: Miley isn't the only one publicly moving on.
